alert.note: Alert for Brown; Kewaunee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Brown and northwestern Kewaunee Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Luxemburg, or 7 miles south of Bay Shore Park. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Luxemburg, Casco, Lincoln, Pilsen, Ellisville, Champion, Thiry Daems, Neuern and Scarboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
